Hi Julien,
here i use unitils and the solution was to use reflection
Search=
 the class org.unitils.util.ReflectionUtils and use helper methods or
other=
s utils class using Reflection solution.

2010/11/26 Rafael <rafael.naufal@=
gmail.com>

>
>
> Private methods are "helper" methods for other methods. I=
f you want to test
> a private method, you should make it at least package =
private.
>
>

au<kauer%40biplane.com.au>>
> wrote:
